name: Darkness on Prettyland
description:
Submission for Code Game Jam 2020 hosted by Antoine Chollet at Montpellier University

Theme : Cute & Creepy

Pitch : There is no more electricity on Prettyland ! You are the janitor and must light the street lights back before the cute creatures living in Prettyland start becoming agressive !

Controls : Move : ZQSD, Shoot Firefly fairies : Left Click Pause : Escape

Team : Initial Dés

Members : Voltan34 (dev, Ennemy AI), Panumzu (dev, Shaders), LuckMk1(dev), Teecs(dev, shaders), Not_My_Username (dev, UX/UI Design)  Le Tabouret Fleuri (Art, Character Design), Zeelyrules (Music, Game and Level Design)
